root: ^Matt? - she looks you up at down and seems disgusted by your state -
^Heh, just as I began to THINK that I could talk to you to sort things out, you're busy making an absolute fool of yourself, once again...
^I don't know why I'm even surprised.

GetScolded: ^After all this time, I would've thought you'd have at least tried to pull your shit together but I guess even that expectation was too high for you to meet.
^I'm sorry I know what I did was wrong...What I'm doing is wrong...
TryExplain: ^Explain? Really Matt? What could you possibly say that would redeem yourself in this situation?
^I'm still processing things, you're not the only one who was hurt you know
^I don't actually have an explanation, I'm sorry...
Dissapointed: ^sigh - Matt, I had hoped that you wouldn't pull this sort of thing again, I just...I can't do this anymore
Annoyed: ^That's seriously what you're going with? Enough with the bullshit excuses okay!?

^I tried to work things out with you, I gave you time, I gave you space, I gave you all that I could give and yet you gave me nothing in return but half-assed excuses for things that were entirely your fault.
ThenWhy: ^Then why are you still doing it? Acting the same as you did back then when times got tough, you'd just give up.
Butwillyou: ^I know you can Matt...the question is, "Will you?"
GoodbyeMatt: ^I suggest you do it for your own sake.
CalmOfferHome: ^It's probably best if we just head home, you look like you could do with some rest
NoDrinkBro: ^I'm gonna have to say no to that, you need water and sleep, we've got work in the morning remember?
Seriously: ^Matt seriously, no more drinks, I'm taking you home.
OfferGoHome: ^Yeah you look pretty out of it. I'll take you home okay bud?
FollowDillon: ^The car's not too far, just around the corner.
